title: How do I stop the new client download?
body: I dont want to download the beta client but the game keeps forcing it on me, is there anyway to stop the download and use the old client?

replies.body: You may be able to bypass the upgrade by launching the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file from inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). Let me know if this worked!
I always launch the game as admin, still doesnt bypass the upgrade.

Gotcha. I've received word that you'll need to complete a clean reinstall at this point if you intend to avoid upgrading to the Alpha Client entirely. You can complete this by grabbing our Hextech Repair Tool, launching the app, checking the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall* then hitting **start**. After the process has finished, launch League to finish patching.

Let me know if this worked for you.
I agree. The download is large and slow for me (about 3 hours on my international connection) and every time I lose connection it starts me back at zero.  I would love the option to cancel it.
